RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Oh io Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAROM tracked leader inside to far turn, rushed up rail to the quarter pole with a steady gain to the lead and kept on, cleared to the wire in ridden out fashion. MONEY PIT trailed to the far turn, rallied wide to the far turn with a grinding run in the stretch run for place spot. DR. FORMAN good position throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. BIG BOSS MAN speed to the front, hounded to the half, gave way readily stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Carom
ENTRY.OWNER: Molumby John and Susan Anderson LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader inside to far turn, rushed up rail to led, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Money Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the far turn, wide grinding run from turn for place

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, hounded to the half, gave way readily stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Forman
ENTRY.OWNER: Southern Springs Stables (Ron Moquett) and Maplewood LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout with no late kick in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming P rice $16,000 (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUICKY DESIRE chased leader to far turn, angled out for run, all out to prevail. PACHANGA LOCA ran outside to front, opened up to turn, could not contain winner. HABOBANERO always trailed with no response and labored to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Habobanero
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed with no response and labored to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Quicky Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, angled out for run, all out to prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Pachanga Loca
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran outside to front, opened up to turn, could not contain winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAYAWAY taken back first turn, settled in, angled in late rush, cleared. STRONG DEMAND chased pace to half, took over cleared off into the stretch but run down in the final furlong while well clear of the rest for place spot. MACI'S GEMSTONE off rail run into first turn in good position to far turn but came up empty in the final furlong. ICY RAIN raced evenly along with no response when needed. DOGWOODS BECCA off rail position while losing ground throughout far back. FIRST WARDEN showed brief speed from the gate with a steady decline to back of pack in a poor performance.

ENTRY.NAME: Layaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back first turn, settled in, angled in late rush, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced eevnly along with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: First Warden
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from the gate with a steady decline to back of pack

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail position while losing ground throughout far back

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Demand
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to half, took over cleared off into stretch, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Tommy C and Heyer Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run into first turn in good position to far turn, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).n ces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SQUID broke sharp from the gate, led at all poles while perfectly handled in easy fashion to the wire. WILDCAT LADY good position never far back throughout while no match in stretch. I'M LEGIT inside run to far turn, rallied in the stretch for show spot. DELIGHTFUL CAT off rail run throughout with no response when needed. A SMILE A DAY chased winner to the stretch, came up empty to the wire. STATUS SYMBOL through early and dropped back readily. The 4th race was hand timed due to a computer malfunction.

ENTRY.NAME: Status Symbol
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and dropped back resily

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Legit
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to far turn, rallied in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Delightful Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run throughout with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back throughout while no match in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: A Smile a Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the stretch, came up empty to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp from gate, led at all pole perfectly handled easy fashion

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Con sidered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNT FROST saved ground to far turn, angled out for the stretch while all out to be along in time with a good effort. SUBDUED pinched back at the start, settled not far back, ran on steadily in the stretch while coming on gamely. BARRISTER TOM sharp break, inside run on the lead to deep stretch, gave in while gamely to the wire. CLEARING WAIVERS shuffled at the start, rushed three wide into the far turn, dueled into the stretch with a game effort to the wire. LORD REVELSTOKE unhurried from inside early on, rallied along to close the gap. VIOLIN MAKER raced along evenly from inside with a mild effort. EL CHEAPO dueled from two path for a half, gave way from quarter pole.

ENTRY.NAME: El Cheapo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path for a half, gave way from quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Revelstoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried from inside early on, rallied along to close the gap

ENTRY.NAME: Violin Maker
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside with a mild effort

ENTRY.NAME: Count Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, angled out in stretch, came on in time

ENTRY.NAME: Subdued
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back start, settled not far back-ran on stretch coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Barrister Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break, inside run on the lead to deep stretch, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Clearing Waivers
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled start, rushed three wide far turn, dueled stretch gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOOGIE BODE chased leader to the stretch, stayed game to get past leader while going away to the wire in a solid effort. CARTOON CAPER troubled start, ran on evenly to the stretch with a late rush for place spot in the final seventy yards. OUTSLEWTHEM sprinted clear to deep stretch, came up empty and stayed on for third spot. WILDERZAR raced along evenly well off rail into the stretch while no real threat. CARNACK ON TOUR always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Wilderzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly well off rail into the stretch no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Boogie Bode
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the stretch, stayed game to get past going away

ENTRY.NAME: Cartoon Caper
ENTRY.COMMENT: troubled start, ran evenly to stretch with a late rush for place

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear to deep stretch, came up empty and stayed third

ENTRY.NAME: Carnack On Tour
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Reg istered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER BOY quick to lead well handled throughout, ran away final furlong in a sharp effort. SUPER BROTHER rushed outside first turn, hounded winner, no match, held place. JOHNNY'S MOMENT between horses first turn, backed out while evenly for show spot. AGENT COOPER raced along evenly with no response when needed. FATHER PATRICK off rail trip while never a menace throughout. TWOBIRDSONESTONE always trailed while dropping far back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Father Patrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip while never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny's Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses first turn, backed out while evenly for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed outside first turn, hounded winner, no match, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Agent Cooper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Martin Perry
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: River Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to lead well handled throughout, ran away final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Twobirdsonestone
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed, dropping far back in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Hor ses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WIMOWEH ground saving trip to far turn, angled out for run to be along in time under stout handling. SOME R BLESSED hustled along, secured good position inside while game to wire. KICK ROCKS KID sprinted clear at once, stayed to deep stretch but outgamed to wire. LEMONADEATTHELATCH unhurried to far turn, rallied along steadily to improve late. WHISKEY HELPS chased leader to the half, stayed on gamely through the drive. PONTI PRIDE wide run first turn with no late kick in the stretch run. DOM GERVASIO good position from outside to far turn used up and faded back. TOP HAT BLITZ through early dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Wimoweh
ENTRY.COMMENT: ground saving trip to far turn, angled out for run along in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spruce Lane Farm, Jeff Gardella & Gary Davidson

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, secured good position inside while game to wire
